00029 #ifndef __SPHERE_H_
00030 #define __SPHERE_H_
00031 
00032 #include "Math.h"
00033 
00034 namespace omega { namespace math 
00035 {
00042         template<typename T>
00043     class Sphere
00044     {
00045     protected:
00046         T mRadius;
00047         vector<3,T> mCenter;
00048     public:
00050         Sphere() : mRadius(1.0), mCenter(vector<3,T>::Zero()) {}
00055         Sphere(const vector<3,T>& center, T radius)
00056             : mRadius(radius), mCenter(center) {}
00057 
00059         T getRadius(void) const { return mRadius; }
00060 
00062         void setRadius(T radius) { mRadius = radius; }
00063 
00065         const vector<3,T>& getCenter(void) const { return mCenter; }
00066 
00068         void setCenter(const vector<3,T>& center) { mCenter = center; }
00069 
00071                 bool intersects(const Sphere<T>& s) const
00072                 {
00073             return (s.mCenter - mCenter).squaredLength() <=
00074                 Math<T>::sqr(s.mRadius + mRadius);
00075                 }
00077                 bool intersects(const AlignedBox3<T>& box) const
00078                 {
00079                         return Math<T>::intersects(*this, box);
00080                 }
00082                 bool intersects(const Plane<T>& plane) const
00083                 {
00084                         return Math<T>::intersects(*this, plane);
00085                 }
00087                 bool intersects(const vector<3,T>& v) const
00088                 {
00089             return ((v - mCenter).squaredLength() <= Math<T>::sqr(mRadius));
00090                 }
00093                 vector<3,T> projectPoint(const vector<3,T> point)
00094                 {
00095                         vector<4,T> sphere = vector<4,T>(mCenter, mRadius);
00096                         vector<3,T> result = sphere.projectOnSphere(point);
00097                         return result;
00098                 }
00099     };
00100 
00101 }
00102 }
00103 #endif
